PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13702018-11-06,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of the firm of accountants Price Waterhouse Coopers as Auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) PRICE WATERHOUSE COOPERS of Ottawa, Ontario, as AUDITOR of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for a period of one year effective November 1, 2018; and, (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for a period of one year effective November 1, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
